Introduction.Title: Hi, I am Avinash Tharwani, Nice to meet you.
Introduction.Content: Since beginning my journey as a profrssional developer nearly 7 years ago, I've done work for various organizations, startups, and collaborated with talented people to create solutions and products for both business and consumer use. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one thing at a time.
